channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nanit Home Display Review: A Transformative Tablet
item.description: The innovative smart baby monitor ecosystem adds a tablet to its lineup. Is it worth overlooking some quirks?

item.title: 10 Best Portable Power Stations (2025): Power Capacity, Portability, Camping, and More
item.description: Whether you’re going off-grid or safeguarding against blackouts, these beefy, WIRED-tested batteries can keep the lights on.

item.title: Best Tested Walking Pads (2025): Urevo, WalkingPad, Sperax
item.description: These compact walking pads fit under your desk and make staying active so much easier.

item.title: India’s Spinny lines up $160M funding to acquire GoMechanic, sources say
item.description: Spinny is set to be valued at about $1.8 billion post-money in its latest funding round.

item.title: The Best Bike Gear for Your Brisk, Wintry Commute (2025)
item.description: Stay strong, fair-weather friends—you can keep biking to work even through the darkest, coldest days.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy XR Review: Needs More Polish
item.description: A little more accessible than the Apple Vision Pro, this Android XR headset could use more polish.

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2025.

item.title: AI data center boom could be bad news for other infrastructure projects
item.description: Improvements to roads, bridges, and other infrastructure could take a hit as data center construction accelerates.

item.title: DoorDash driver faces felony charges after allegedly spraying customers’ food
item.description: A woman is facing felony charges in Evansville, Indiana over a DoorDash delivery in which she allegedly sprayed the food with a substance that made th...

item.title: Inside Rivian’s big bet on AI-powered self-driving
item.description: Rivian demonstrated the progress it's made, and in the process showed just how far it still has to go to make its cars autonomous.
